page_content:
Accenture (UK) Limited

Accenture Pega Case Exception Management Applications

Accenture's specialist services provide the skills to deliver Case & Exception Management systems built on Pegasystems market-leading business process management (BPM) technology. Our services include access to and the use of our leading methodology, tools and accelerators that form the Accenture’s Foundation Platform for Pega (AFP-P).

Features

  • End-to-end offering: strategy, processes, requirements, design, training, development, running
  • Leading Pega Practice: implementation guides plus custom tooling & assets
  • Reference Architectures and Models to accelerate functional and technical design
  • Change Management Expertise
  • Specialist Application Maintenance Team to provide one-to-many resolution
  • Service Management accredited ISO20000, ITIL methodology
  • Blend Across 3-Tier Model of onsite, onshore (Newcastle) and offshore
  • One-to-Many services to share the most experienced resources
  • Security Cleared resources
  • ISO27001 Information Security accreditation at UK Delivery Centre in Newcastle

Benefits

  • Typically 40% efficiency and/or 30% revenue uplift
  • Dashboard of work, resources and skills enabling real time management
  • Unlocks trapped value existing systems through comprehensive out-of-the-box integration
  • Processing of backlog through analytic root-cause prevention of exceptions
  • Standardises and automates regulatory reporting
  • Assured project implementation utilising Accenture’s methodology for Pega solutions
  • High requirements/solution match through local acumen, engagement and delivery
  • Right price and location delivered through 3-tier model
  • Pick/mix services from business strategy consulting to live service support
  • Solution evolves with your organisation

Pricing

£815 per person per day

  • Excluding VAT
  • Termination costs apply
  • Minimum contract period: Other
